nodes.text: Toledian was a planet located in the Mid Rim. Around 34 ABY, a mining accident destroyed Toledian's main city. The incident, and the chaos that followed, came to be known on the planet Batuu, where it was discussed by residents of Black Spire Outpost. Julen Rakab, a Batuuan resident, overheard a discussion about the accident while he was with the smuggler Izal Garsea at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo. The historian Eloc Throno included Toledian on a map in his book, Traveler's Guide to Batuu.
Toledian was first mentioned in the 2019 novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova.
